output: html_document
slug: global-team
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE)

library(purrr)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyr)
```


```{r parse, include=FALSE}
csv <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rladies/starter-kit/master/global-team.csv'
team <- readr::read_csv(csv) %>%
  separate_rows(title, sep = ",")

```

```{r content, echo=F}
team %>% 
  kable(align = "rl") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F) %>%
  column_spec(2, bold = T) %>%
  collapse_rows(columns = 1:2, valign = "top")
```
